entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor HTML attribute smart indentation does not indent an extra level on enter #36065
  • Not able to receive values from Route and Body in a POST call #36063
  • LinkGenerator always returns null when trying to generate link in Integration Tests. #36053
  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #36052
  • Exponential RAM usage growth on startup with multiple [Route] attributes that specify templates with variable prefixes #36051
  • Investigate Selenium Upgrade #36048
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, connectionclose #36046
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36045
  • "C# 10(preview) + ASP.NET Core Web App (.NET 6.0) + AppendTargetFrameworkToOutputPath=False" produce compilation error #36039
  • Razor Pages Folder doesn't seen to see changes. #36038
  • Consider moving Kestrel shared source test attributes to src\Shared #36035
    .NET 7-Candidate
  • Add configurations to test matrix #36032
    6.0-rc2
  • Workaround for challenging certain authentication schemes without HttpContext #36030
  • ASP.net Core Identity, password settings ignored #36029
    Backlog
  • Allow more oidc-client options to be set in OidcProviderOptions for Blazor wasm authentication. #36028
  • ASP.NET Core SignalR messages are stalled for hours and lost #36020
  • .NET 6 preview 7 Blazor - Mobile device - Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. RangeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory #36019
  • AddJwtBearer middleware support for JWKS without discovery document #36016
  • Startup improvement: json #36015
  • Perf regression: json_actix #36013
  • Razor Editor: snippets are supported but the 'Snippet' menu command does not appear in context menu #36011
  • [Feedback] New Razor (ASP.NET Core) editor .editorconfig issues (VS 2022 Preview 3.1) #36010
    17.0-Preview5
  • dotnet dev-certs tool prints incorrect example usage #36008
  • Improve minimal api routing with grouping #36007
  • Reduce boilerplate when enabling runtime compilation for a Razor Class Library #36006
  • Move Razor's language server OOP #35999
    Razor.Tooling

Closed

  • W3CLogging "time" not precise enough, leading to "time-taken" being significantly wrong #35613
    6.0-rc2
  • Capture Endpoint and RouteValues on IStatusCodeReExecuteFeature #35652
    7.0-preview1
  • The error message for when calling UseStartup isn't correct #35830
    6.0-rc2
  • ClickOnce fails for BlazorWinFormsApp and BlazorWpfApp #31832
    6.0-rc1
  • [Blazor-Server] Ability to change renderer's Culture on each component #35965
  • Http/3 for IIS #29078
    6.0-rc2
  • Invalid Confirmation Email Code Resource is missing in IdentityErrorDescriber #27416
    .NET 7-Candidate
  • Still producing the Readme.md about identity server when creating a Blazor webassembly app with AAD or AAD B2C auth #35971
    6.0-rc2
  • RoleExistsAsync method not working in Identity RoleManager #35946
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup regression: mvc, plaintext #36014
  • Html.ActionLink() returns incorrect URL when Minimal Action with Name metadata in use #35592
    6.0-rc2
  • Create SemanticToken Snapshot tests #26186
    Razor.Tooling
  • API call returns an Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #32646
    6.0-rc2
  • NullReferenceException thrown when making a call to secured API while not authenticated in Blazor WASM app with MSAL auth #30538
    6.0-rc2
  • Remove reliance on preview LanguageVersion for incremental RSG #33848
    6.0-rc2
  • Generics and Inheritance #29105
    6.0-rc2
  • Add support for using endpoint metadata to add tags to an endpoint for use in OpenAPI descriptions #35310
    6.0-rc2
  • Blazor: expose 'replace' parameter in NavigationManager.NavigateTo #25540
    Backlog
  • FormatValueAsString() running too often too many times. #35908
  • Adding a component specific CSS file doesn't trigger `dotnet watch` #33569
    6.0-rc2
  • blazor-hotreload.js is missing if `UseFrameworkFiles` is set to a subdirectory #35967
  • Codespaces Hover Contains GUID #24260
  • Detecting when attributes are put on a method called by a lambda instead of the lambda itself #35638
    6.0-rc2
  • VS2019 - Razor Language Services - Shared Project - ".cshtml is not a descendent of the base path" #33550
  • Verify VSCode Razor Component Add Using/Fully Qualify Code Actions #31608
  • Create Blazor Server project, delete '@page' one by one and then type "@pa", press Enter to complete intellisense, it meet error "The name 'xxx' does #30601
  • Race condition with On Type Formatting #30447
  • Unexpected Colorization in DDRIT Testing Env #27117
  • Incorrect CSS style completion in Razor component after hyphen #27150
  • Discuss and Resolve Obsolete Types with LSP #31133
  • onTypeRename Does Not Work in Codespaces #29836
  • Deeply nested implicit C# brackets do not colorize in codespaces #29838
  • Property snippet not working #22744
  • Auto-completing `@oninput` with `=` does not insert `""` #27129
  • Curly Brace Range Highlighting #22804
  • Indentation problem in Razor View on VS2019 Preview 4.0 #30080

PullRequests

Created

  • Add minimal option to webapi template #36068
    area-mvc
  • PersonalDataAttribute should only apply to properties #36067
    area-identity
  • [release/6.0] Log time-taken more precisely #36066
    area-runtime
  • Improve error messages for missing body and services #36064
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Fix null-ref for MSAL WASM Auth #36056
    area-blazor
  • Fix issues with hosting startups #36055
    area-runtime
  • sealed internal classes in default builder #36043
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Win11 helix-matrix/quarantine queue, remove win7/8 #36040
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid pinning JSInterop code when unused #36036
    area-blazor
  • Update templates to use scoped CSS (#35658) #36027
    area-mvc
  • Add support for WithTags extension method (#35672) #36026
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d924d7` to `955c7f8` #36022
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d924d7` to `955c7f8` #36021
    area-infrastructure
  • HTTP/3: Support canceling requests that aren't reading a body #36017
    area-runtime
  • Fix sample usage for --format argument #36009
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Fix frame type exception message in Http3InMemory #36005
    area-runtime
  • Throw for bad requests intended for minimal route handlers in development #36004
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: Guid handling in KeyRingBasedDataProtector.cs #36061
    area-dataprotection, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Improve the errors around UseStartup/Configure #36060
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Log time-taken more precisely #35863
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #36002
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #36003
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3 with IIS #36054
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Big-endian fixes: Guid handling in KeyRingBasedDataProtector.cs #35715
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix null-ref for MSAL WASM Auth #35872
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Fix ambiguous Map method with minimal APIs #36044
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Capture Endpoint and Routes Values in IStatusCodeReExecuteFeature #36037
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve the errors around UseStartup/Configure #36047
    area-runtime, feature-minimal-hosting, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Pass request cancellation token when using IAsyncEnumerable in MVC and WriteAsJsonAsync #35993
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Startup analyzers work for minimal apps #35987
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • HTTP/3 with IIS #35934
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] RoleManager.RoleExistsAsync role name normalization issue #36050
    area-identity, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix ambiguous Map method with minimal APIs #35631
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Don't generate Action links to non-Action named endpoints #36042
    6.0-rc2
  • Revert "Upgrade Selenium Version" #36033
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • RoleManager.RoleExistsAsync role name normalization issue #35997
    area-identity, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Don't generate Action links to non-Action named endpoints #35955
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Revert "release/6.0 Upgrade Selenium Driver" #36034
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Add .NET Dev Certs to DevContainer By Default #36000
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #36024
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Quarantine `LinkedApplicationTests.LinkedApplicationWorks` #35978
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `0134d73` to `955c7f8` #36023
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • Remove UseRouting from templates #36069
    area-mvc
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • [release/5.0] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35953
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • onBoard package validation #35846
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for stating accepts/consumes metadata is required or not #35875
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/3.1] Align CODEOWNERS with 'main' #35950
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Use minimal APIs for F# project templates #35833
    area-mvc
  • WIP: Strongly-typed SignalR hub proxies and callback handlers #33717
    area-signalr, api-suggestion, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Bootstrap v4 support #35981
    area-identity
